column1: #Text=Since Czar Putin is helping prolong the Syrian civil war - let Russia step up and take the refugees !

#Text=Many of the 'refugees' walking into EU are economic refugees from many countries - Germany made a HUGE mistake in 2015 when they told the world that the red carpet was out Now Germany and EU can not stop the flood of people wanting a better lifeMoore, Garry R - Solutions Inc
